description:
Alcohol Ink is an amazing medium that is just now beginning to be noticed! In this course you will learn what Alcohol Inks are and how I use them to create a beautiful, bold, and spontaneous Moon-scape painting!

This is a beginner course. We will cover all the materials needed as well as how prepare your Yupo paper, what inks are, how they work, how to use them wet in wet to create a smooth background, how to layer inks for a detailed painting, and finally how to seal the painting.

This course will take you 2 hours or less to complete a painting.
title: Alcohol Ink on Yupo Creative Fun Learn to Paint Easy Steps
